        Important Message

        Safety Information

        Please be careful not to get into your eyes when applying. Also, do not rub your eyes until the liquid is dry. Effects may vary by individual, so please try them carefully

        Ingredients

        Water, hydrolyzed mucocopse, hyaluronic acid, capriyl glycol, hexapeptide-2, palmitoyl pen taptide-4, sodium lactate, PCA-Na, sorbitol, prorine, sodium phosphate, biotine, cha leaf extract, sodium chloride, papaya fruit extract, grape seed extract, silk amino acid, pheite extract, pheacid, pheus seed noxiethano L,isopropyl croprostanate, sodium benzoate, fokbei fluoresoex, czophine root extract, panthenol, (Aqrelite/alkyl acrylate (C10-30) cross polymerer, polysorbate 20, TEA

        Directions

        Apply the eyelash to the eyelashes once a day before sleeping on the eyeliner

        Product description

        Product Description

        Please note that some customers may cause allergic reactions in very rare cases, so we will not be responsible for any problems such as skin wearing this product. In addition, we cannot accept returns or refunds in such cases.

        Because it is a "strong and beautiful" eyelashes, it contains ingredients such as moisturizing, hair roots, and exfoliation.
        Moisturizing → Hyaluronic Acid
        Hair root: Ginkou leaf extract
        Promotes demolization of weakened eyelashes (Other: Biotine, Cha Leaf Extract, Lazardine Root Extract)
        Grape Seed Extract, Prevents Eyelashes from being Delicated. (Other: Hexapeptide-2, Palmitoir Pentachide-4, PCA-Na)
        Pantail: The effect of keeping the hair sturdy.
        Breaks down the exfoliata: Papaya fruit extract, removes deposited stains on the skin of the eyes, making the skin smooth and easy to grow.
        Silk amino acids: Repairs and prevents damaged eyelashes Other: Hokbei Hurosowekis
